meanings.definition: A person or thing that swipes.
meanings.sent1: The swiper at the store scanned my items quickly.
meanings.sent2: I need a swiper to clean the table.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat acted as a swiper, knocking things off the shelf.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers moved like a swiper, effortlessly gliding across the screen.
meanings.sent5: The swiper in the game was so fast, it was hard to keep up.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used for swiping.
meanings.sent1: I used the swiper to open the electronic lock.
meanings.sent2: The swiper on the phone helps navigate through pages.
meanings.sent3: The swiper in the kitchen made cooking more efficient.
meanings.sent4: His hand moved the swiper like a conductor leading an orchestra.
meanings.sent5: The swiper's smooth motion made the task effortless.

meanings.definition: A software feature that allows users to swipe on a touchscreen device.
meanings.sent1: The app's swiper lets you scroll through photos easily.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to use the swiper to switch between apps.
meanings.sent3: The swiper on the phone made playing games more fun.
meanings.sent4: Her finger danced on the swiper, moving through the menu effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The swiper function on the tablet was intuitive and user-friendly.
